name: Cerrado's Theme
description:
This is a 100% authorial composition of mine, which was performed by the band EM AUGUST CHOVE on their last studio album. I decided to bring an orchestral version in order to explore the various nuances that permeate this composition.

As an audiovisual piece, I worked on the mastering to be simulated on a 3D oscilloscope, digitally colored and finalized through the Cathodemer to give some textures.

[An oscilloscope is a way of representing in 3D the sound heard, bringing an immersiveness to this objkt, as it amplifies for the eyes what the ears hear]
